lead_paragraph: GILBERT--William, Monday January 18th, 2016 in Berkshire County, MA. Son of late Morris and Florence (nee Kirschman) Goldberg, husband of late Grace (nee Cohan) Gilbert. Pioneer ski area operator and snowmaker he had resided in South Egremont, MA. Survived by daughter Patti Serden (Scott) and son Tom (Beverly), grandchildren Kelli and Heather Serden and Matthew Gilbert. Memorial service at Catamount Ski Area, S. Egremont April 16, 2016. Memorials to STRIDE Adaptive Sports or The Michael J. Fox Foundation, C/O Roche Funeral Home, 120 Main, Lenox, MA 01240. 1/3
